description:
Tall guys rejoice - style and comfort finally go hand in hand with the Hawkins tall hoodie from Navas Lab.
The dynamic blend of midweight bamboo and lycra makes the Hawkins hoodie a popular choice for tall skinny guys around the world. The bamboo-lycra fabric is especially breathable while offering a clean, contemporary fit along with a sharp, timeless design.

The Hawkins hoodie delivers a feel-good fit and adequate warmth for year-round wear. Indoors or outdoors, the Hawkins hoodie gets the job done. Navas Lab brings tall guys a sleek zip-up look featuring two front pockets and a phone sleeve.

The Hawkins tall guy hoodie was prototyped on a 6'6" tall man, so you can rest assured it's made with tall slim guys like you in mind. Fit. Finally.
name: Navas Lab Apparel Hawkins - Tall Hoodie - Mens
